scripts.coverage-report: npm run coverage && istanbul report html
scripts.fetch-test262: git submodule init && git submodule update
scripts.test-all: npm run test-node && npm run test-browser && npm run test-262
scripts.test-node: npm run test-unit && npm run test-cli && npm run test-regression
scripts.test: npm run test-node && npm run test-browser
